title: About me
content1: Whether you want a simple e-commerce app for your small business, or you need someone to work on a scalable distributed application, I am here to help you.
content2: I worked in the banking sector and now I work as a software developer for a tech company.
content3: As a full stack developer, I built a complete solution for a bank that needed documentation management. My direct experience with the banking industry allows me to understand what are the needs of a big business.
